page.title: 16GLEBE GARAGE.
page.content: Glebe garage is situated on Derby road. It is a major Ford dealer and also sells petrol. The business has only one branch and keeps labour costs low by using self service pumps supplied from 77000l underground tanks which are refilled weekly,(a process taking one hour). Petrol is supplied to the garage by Carringtons of Manchester for sale at 43p a litre, 90% of which is tax. Approximately 2000 people are served with petrol per week and the average purchase is 14l and the maximum is 92l and the minimum is 0.5l. During a year the garage will sell on average 1300 cars. The most popular model being the Ford Escort. The most popular colours are beige, red and blue.
